attributes.action: Stop none eventually people working in peoples houses I.e cleaners and painters.
attributes.additional_details:
Cancel none essential access to peoples homes 
Cleaners 
Decorators 
Carpet cleaners
Indoor window cleaners
Give more support for self employed and single working mums/dads
attributes.background:
I’m a cleaner I’m self employed and a single mum I have no choice but to work unless more support is offered for us.
I go in and out of 3/4 different houses a day from school teaches to travelling workers.
Ppe can’t be worn all day as it’s considerably uncomfortable while cleaning as u struggle
